settings.banner_content:
Our trade program, conceived with design professionals in mind, provides everything you need to fulfil your objectives and those of your clients.
Lifely is your one-step for all your design business needs, from exclusive discounts to out-of-this-world customer service.

settings.text: No project is too big or too small. Lifely offers a wide range of furniture to match your clients’ tastes and budget for every room.

We cut out the showrooms, the middle men, the mark-ups and the commissions.
All that’s left is good furniture.
Home just got a little more Lifely.

settings.title: Exclusive Discounts
settings.text: Take advantage of our Tiered Discount System to save big on all your business needs. Our competitive pricing gets even more affordable with no minimum purchase thanks to our member-exclusive discount program.

settings.title: Personalised Service
settings.text: We know that your time is precious as a busy professional. Our dedicated team provides customised guidance throughout the buying process and answer any enquiries so you can achieve your objectives as efficiently as possible. We take your success to heart and will work tirelessly by your side until you are entirely satisfied.

settings.title: Early Access
settings.text: Staying in the know is an integral part of being a trade professional. Thanks to our membership program, you get access to our latest collections before anyone else, so your space can always look fresh and up to date.

settings.title: No Minimum Purchase
settings.text: Whether it is a minor room update or a complete overhaul of your commercial space, your project matters to us. Our trade program does not include any minimum purchase so that you can take full advantage of your member-exclusive benefits at any time.

settings.subheading: Welcome to all Trade Professionals, from Interior Designers, Event Providers, and Home Stagers to Hospitality providers. Let’s collaborate, one space at a time!

settings.heading: Our Brand Story
settings.content: At Lifely, we believe that a comfortable and stylish home should not be a luxury. Our mission is to offer trendy, high-quality furniture that fits every taste and budget for every room in the house. Instead of focusing on mark-ups and commission, we keep our prices low by passing the discounts to you. We take pride in offering high craftsmanship and fabulous design for an affordable cost.
